title: ACTIONS AVAILABLE TO ALL HEROES
text:
Advance (1AP)

Bank Soul (1AP): permanent damage to opponent's Effigy

Buy/Trade/Sell Magical Artefact (1AP + X)

Hand Over Magical Artefact (1AP)

Charge (1AP + melee weapon cost): +2 hexes on charge and +2

attack dice

Stand Your Ground (1F): -1 to attacker's dice pool during a Charge
